entries.name: base64(n=nil)
entries.desc: SecureRandom.base64 generates a random base64 string.

entries.name: hex(n=nil)
entries.desc: SecureRandom.hex generates a random hexadecimal string.

entries.name: random_bytes(n=nil)
entries.desc: SecureRandom.random_bytes generates a random binary string.

entries.name: urlsafe_base64(n=nil, padding=false)
entries.desc: SecureRandom.urlsafe_base64 generates a random URL-safe base64 string.

entries.name: uuid()
entries.desc: SecureRandom.uuid generates a random v4 UUID (Universally Unique IDentifier).
